privacy_mask_h.intro_Txt2: configurable areas of solid color that allow concealment of parts of the image that should not be viewable.
privacy_mask_h.intro_Txt3: Privacy masks cannot be bypassed via the AXIS VAPIX HTTP API.
privacy_mask_h.intro_Txt4: Privacy masks are up to 3 configurable areas of solid color that allow concealment of parts of the image that should not be viewable.
privacy_mask_h.intro_Txt5: Privacy masks cannot be bypassed via the AXIS VAPIX HTTP API.
privacy_mask_h.list_Txt1: The Privacy Mask List shows all the masks that are currently configured in the device and if they are enabled.
privacy_mask_h.list_Txt2: To add a privacy mask click Add and follow the instructions under Add/Edit Mask. To delete a mask, select it in the list and click Remove. To enable or disable a mask select it in the list and click Enable/disable.
privacy_mask_h.add_Txt8: Note: Privacy masks are not available in Overview mode. Privacy Mask can only be added in Normal mode.
privacy_mask_h.add_Txt2: Click Add and place the box over the desired area to conceal. Preset positions and Zoom bar can be used to navigate to the desired area of the image.
privacy_mask_h.add_Txt3: Choose a color, black, white, gray or red for the box from the drop-down list Privacy mask color.
privacy_mask_h.add_Txt3-1: Choose a color, black, white, gray, red or blurred for the box from the drop-down list Privacy mask color.
privacy_mask_h.add_Txt4: Enter a descriptive name in Mask name.
privacy_mask_h.add_Txt5: Click Zoom level to set the level at which the privacy mask should be visible. Note that the presented zoom position and zoom limit values are just approximations of the actual values, so it is not guaranteed that the mask will be shown even though the presented zoom position matches the presented zoom limit. The visibility of the mask is governed by the actual zoom limit and the actual zoom position.
privacy_mask_h.edit_Txt1: To edit a privacy mask select it and reshape, move or change color as needed.
privacy_mask_h.edit_Txt2: Note: If it is not possible to add more masks, pan 180 degrees and then add the additional number of masks needed.
privacy_mask_h.edit_Txt3: Note: Adding many privacy masks may affect camera's performance.
privacy_mask_h.res_Txt1: Choose a desired resolution for viewing while setting up privacy masks from the View in drop-down list.
privacy_mask_h.res_Txt2: Click Add and place the box over the desired area to conceal.
privacy_mask_h.res_Txt3: Choose a color, black, white, gray or red for the box from the drop-down list Privacy mask color.
privacy_mask_h.res_Txt3-1: Choose a color, black, white, gray, red or blurred for the box from the drop-down list Privacy mask color.
privacy_mask_h.oneMaskColor_Txt: This product supports only one privacy mask color, as a result, no option for selecting a mask color is presented.
privacy_mask_h.res_Txt4: Enter a descriptive name in Mask name.
privacy_mask_h.edit_Txt4: To edit a privacy mask select it and reshape, move or change color as needed.
